public class test {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		//get seconds
		long totalSeconds = System.currentTimeMillis() / 1000;
		long currentSeconds = totalSeconds % 60;
		//get minutes
		long totalMinutes = totalSeconds / 60;
		long currentMinutes = totalMinutes % 60;
		//get hours
		long totalHours = totalMinutes / 60;
		long currentHours = totalHours % 24;
		//display time
		System.out.println(format(currentHours + 8,2) + ":" +
		format(currentMinutes,2) + ":" + format(currentSeconds,2));

                                /*SimpleDateFormat formatter = new SimpleDateFormat("dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss");  
                                System.out.println(formatter.format(date));*/
	}

	private static String format(long number, int width) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		String numString = String.valueOf(number);
		int lengthOfNumber = numString.length();
		for(int i = 1;i <= width-lengthOfNumber;i++) {
			numString = "0" + numString;
		}
		return numString;
	}
}
